skills.name: Earth Spike
skills.desc: if[AffixIsEquipped(SNO.Affix.legendary_druid_047)]<text class='c_label'>Cooldown:</text> <text class='c_resource'>[[Affix_Value_1#legendary_druid_047]|1|]</text> seconds</br><text class='c_label'>Generate Spirit:</text> <text class='c_resource'>13</text></br>ifADVANCED_TOOLTIP<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit Chance: </text><text class='c_resource'>35%</text></br>Sunder the earth, impaling the first enemy hit for <text class='c_number'>[0.17 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))]</text> damage.

skills.name: Pulverize
skills.desc: <text class='c_label'>Spirit Cost:</text> <text class='c_resource'>35</text></br>ifADVANCED_TOOLTIP<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit Chance: </text><text class='c_resource'>25%</text></br>Shapeshift into a Werebear and slam the ground, dealing <text class='c_number'>[0.5 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))]</text> damage to surrounding enemies.

skills.name: Debilitating Roar
skills.desc: <text class='c_label'>Cooldown: </text><text class='c_resource'>[22 * (cdr[sLevel]]</text> seconds</br>Shapeshift into a Werebear and bellow a mighty roar, reducing Nearby enemies' damage dealt by <text class='c_number'>70%</text> for <text class='c_number'>4</text> seconds.

skills.name: Earthen Bulwark
skills.desc: <text class='c_label'>Cooldown: </text><text class='c_resource'>16</text> seconds</br>ifADVANCED_TOOLTIP<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit Chance: </text><text class='c_resource'>30%</text></br>Rocks surround you for <text class='c_number'>[(3 + [Affix_Value_2#legendary_druid_026])]</text> seconds, granting a <text class='c_important'><u>Barrier</u></text> that absorbs <text class='c_number'>[[0.45 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))]*100]%</text> of your Base Life <text class='c_number'>([0.45 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))])</text> in damage.

skills.name: Grizzly Rage
skills.desc: <text class='c_label'>Cooldown: </text><text class='c_resource'>50</text> seconds</br>Shapeshift into ifMod.Upgrade1an <text class='c_important'><u>Unstoppable</u></text>elsea Dire Werebear for <text class='c_number'>[(10 * [1 + 0.25*sLevel]) + [Affix_Value_1#legendary_druid_104]]</text> seconds gaining <text class='c_number'>50000%</text> bonus damage and <text class='c_number'>50100%</text> Damage Reduction. Damage bonus is increased by <text class='c_number'>50500%</text> each second while in this form.</br></br>Kills extend the duration by <text class='c_number'>506</text> second up to <text class='c_number'>507</text> additional seconds.ifMod.DELETEME</br></br>Casting <text class='c_important'>Grizzly Rage</text> causes enemies in the area to take <text class='c_number'>0</text> damage and be Slowed by <text class='c_number'>50%</text> for <text class='c_number'>6</text> seconds.

skills.name: Trample
skills.desc: ifMod.Spirit<text class='c_label'>Generates Spirit:</text> <text class='c_resource'>40</text></br><text class='c_label'>Cooldown: </text><text class='c_resource'>14</text> seconds</br>ifADVANCED_TOOLTIP<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit Chance: </text><text class='c_resource'>20%</text></br>Shapeshift into a Werebear, become <text class='c_important'><u>Unstoppable</u></text>, and charge forward, dealing <text class='c_number'>[0.75 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))]</text> damage and Knocking Back enemies.</br></br>Enemies who are Knocked Back into terrain take an additional <text class='c_number'>[0.45 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))]</text> damage and are Stunned for <text class='c_number'>3</text> seconds.

equipment.name: Loop
added_affixes: <text class='c_important'>Pulverize</text> is now also an <text class='c_important'>Earth</text> Skill. After casting <text class='c_important'>Pulverize</text>, tectonic spikes continue to deal <text class='c_random'>1.12</text> damage over <text class='c_number'>3</text> seconds.

equipment.name: Caged Heart
base_affixes: <text class='c_random'>10.45%</text> of incoming damage is instead suppressed. When you use a <text class='c_important'>Defensive</text>, <text class='c_important'>Subterfuge</text> or a <text class='c_important'>Macabre</text> skill, all suppressed damage is amplified by <text class='c_number'>250%</text> and explodes, dealing up to <text class='c_random'>5.96</text> Fire damage to Nearby enemies.

equipment.name: Circle
base_affixes: Restore <text class='c_random'>4.2</text> of your Primary Resource when you Crowd Control an enemy.

equipment.name: Impact Hammer
strikethrough_affixes:
Casting a <text class='c_important'>Storm</text> Skill grants your <text class='c_important'>Earth</text> Skills <text class='c_random'>52.14%</text> Critical Strike Damage for <text class='c_number'>6</text> seconds.

Casting a <text class='c_important'>Earth</text> Skill increases the Critical Strike Chance of <text class='c_important'>Storm</text> Skills by <text class='c_random'>13.91%</text> for <text class='c_number'>6</text> seconds.
<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit:</text> Up to a +11.4% Chance to Execute Injured Non-Elites
added_affixes: The duration of <text class='c_important'>Grizzly Rage</text> is increased by <text class='c_random'>7.27</text> seconds. In addition, Critical Strikes while <text class='c_important'>Grizzly Rage</text> is active increase your Critical Strike Damage by <text class='c_number'>15%</text> for the duration.

equipment.name: Caged Heart
base_affixes: Every <text class='c_number'>5</text> seconds while above <text class='c_number'>60%</text> Life, <text class='c_important'>Core</text> Skills cost <text class='c_random'>0.18</text> Life instead of your Primary Resource. Skills that consume Life deal <text class='c_random'>18.24%</text> increased damage.

equipment.name: Primordial Fetish
base_affixes: <text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit:</text> Up to a +22.32% Chance to Slow
+6.6% Lucky Hit Chance while You Have a Barrier
added_affixes: Your <text class='c_important'>Core</text> Skills deal up to <text class='c_random'>52.23% </text> increased damage based on your amount of <text class='c_important'><u>Fortify</u></text>.

equipment.name: Necklace
strikethrough_affixes: Critical Strikes with <text class='c_important'>Core</text> Skills increase your Attack Speed by <text class='c_random'>31.5%</text> for <text class='c_number'>7.5</text> seconds.
added_affixes: Critical Strikes with <text class='c_important'>Core</text> Skills increase your Attack Speed by <text class='c_random'>37.5%</text> for <text class='c_number'>7.5</text> seconds.

equipment.name: Primal Chausses
base_affixes: +8.72% Total Armor while in Werebear Form
added_affixes: <text class='c_important'>Basic</text> Skills grant <text class='c_number'>30%</text> Damage Reduction for <text class='c_random'>8.63</text> seconds.

equipment.name: Caged Heart
base_affixes: After spending <text class='c_random'>183.24</text> of your Primary Resource, your next attack Stuns enemies hit for <text class='c_number'>1</text> seconds.

equipment.name: Sovereign Greaves
added_affixes: Damage from <text class='c_important'>Earth</text> Skills Slow enemies hit by <text class='c_random'>64.91%</text> for <text class='c_number'>7.5</text> seconds.

equipment.name: Sovereign Vambraces
added_affixes: <text class='c_important'>Pulverize</text> creates a shockwave that travels forward, dealing <text class='c_random'>127.95%</text> of its damage to targets in the path.
+21% Critical Strike Damage with Earth Skills

equipment.name: Insatiable Fury
base_affixes: Werebear form is now your true form, and you gain <text class='c_number'>+3</text> Ranks to all <text class='c_important'>Werebear</text> Skills.
+14.76% Total Armor while in Werebear Form

equipment.name: Vasily's Prayer
base_affixes: Your <text class='c_important'>Earth</text> Skills are now also <text class='c_important'>Werebear</text> Skills and <text class='c_important'><u>Fortify</u></text> you for <text class='c_random'>0.01</text>.
